body.name: JOYIN 3 Pack Monster Truck Toy - Motion Activated Light-Up Cars for Toddlers - Monster Treads Lightning Wheels - Baby Toy Gift - Press & Go Cars for Boys Girls
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 21 hrs 32 mins
features: Glow Rover Monster Truck Adventures!: Dive into Play period with our Shark, Bull, and Tyrannosaurus toy cars! Each one is a vibrant light-up monster truck that's perfect for toddlers, boasting bright wheels that dazzle with every roll.

Press, Release, Dash!: Experience the fun of race car toys with a twist. The whole animal chassis is press-able! Engage in the simple "Press & Go" feature – just press down to store energy, release, and watch your chosen creature dash forward. Tailored excitement for toddler play.

Dazzling LED Wheel Lights: Illuminate their Play period! All four wheels of each truck toy with bright, yet eye-friendly LED lights that dynamically change colors, setting the mood for a luminous adventure.
Chomp in Action: As these monster trucks roll, their mouths move in realistic chomping motion, embodying the spirit of the wild and enhancing the Play period experience.
Easy Light Control: Thoughtfully designed, each light up toy truck has an LED switch at the front, ensuring controlling the vibrant light display is a breeze for those tiny fingers.

Safe & Durable Monster Truck Design: Crafted with soft round edges for trucks for toddlers, they're perfectly tailored for little racers. Made with resilient high-strength ABS material, they're ready for endless imaginative play.

Engaging & Educational: Not just light up cars, each vibrant monster truck is printed with its animal name - Shark, Bull, or T-Rex, making learning an integral part of Play period while promoting animal recognition and cognitive development.

Perfect Gift for Little Enthusiasts: Pre-equipped with 3 LR44 button batteries for each truck, the Glow Rover Monster Truck Set stands out as the ideal light up toys gift, guaranteeing radiant smiles and gleaming eyes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fun Monster Trucks with Lights: A Hit!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this set of monster trucks with lights for my grandson, and I have to say, they've been a big hit! He absolutely loves the flashing lights and the moving mouths on these trucks.However, there was a bit of a snag with one of the trucks in the set. Unfortunately, it didn't work properly right out of the box. The push-and-go mechanism, which is supposed to make the truck automatically go forward, didn't work at all. Despite this hiccup, my grandson still enjoys playing with the trucks. While he still can't pushing down the truck to make it go (he's 12 months old), he's still has fun pushing them around manually. The adult in the room have fun pushing them down and making them run.Although it was disappointing to have one truck not work as expected, returning it was a bit challenging since it was already given as a gift. So, we're making do with two working trucks and one that doesn't work. I'm hopeful that as my grandson grows older, he'll be able to manage the push-and-go action more easily.Overall, it's a fun buy and I'm sure he'll continue to enjoy playing with them as he grows.
